Job Posting: 177124 - Position: S26 Test Automation Developer - Summer 2026 Co-op/Intern 177124B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/21/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/14/2026 11:40 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Definity Financial Corporation 111 Westmount Road South Waterloo N2J 4S4 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2026 - Summer S26 Test Automation Developer - Summer 2026 Co-op/Intern 177124B Co-op Position Waterloo, ON Canada 4 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description 22.5 per hour for 0 Major List Definity is the parent company to some of Canada's most long-standing and innovative insurance brands, including Economical Insurance, Sonnet Insurance, Family Insurance Solutions, and Petline Insurance. Our ambition is to be one of Canada's leading and most innovative property and casualty insurers. We can't do that without our people, so we embrace and encourage a culture that's collaborative, ambitious, rewarding, and empowering. We offer a flexible, hybrid work experience where employees work from the office and virtually depending on the type of work they are doing and who they are working with. Bring your true self and be a part of our journey. It's better here. YOUR NEXT CO-OP PLACEMENT Work term: Summer 2026 Work term length: 4-month From classroom to co-op to career, every step of your journey has an impact on your future. That's why it makes sense to choose a co-op placement with a company that offers truly rewarding work and real-life experience. At Definity®, your contributions, creativity, and energy will be put to good use, and you'll get to be involved with initiatives that support our strategic goals and use your skills in a supportive team environment. If you're looking for a company that takes care of its people - full time, part time, and co-ops alike - and has a track record of doing big things, get ready to love it here. What can you expect in this role? Quality Assurance is a highly strategic and challenging area of our IT business that deals with the validation and verification of software systems and data. Economical Insurance is seeking a technical Student in Quality Assurance to join us in this important area. You are a student of a Computer Science or related program. You want to work in an Agile team in a professional environment and expand your skills on a project that matters. You are willing to get your hands dirty both testing and/or coding. Your programming skills and expertise in software are impeccable. This is a technical role, spans multiple technology spaces, and offers a good opportunity to gain and apply experience in a range of systems supporting multiple projects and infrastructures. The successful candidate will be involved with identifying test scenarios, creating and executing test cases and potentially writing automated test scripts. You'll be working closely with the Quality Engineering team that operates in an Agile environment, working on initiatives that span the business to implement common QA, DevOps, and Development goals. What you'll be doing • Leveraging AI in all phases of SDLC • Designing and scripting automated tests on Web Apps and Mobile Apps • POC on latest technologies • Software Testing tool development and evaluation Problem solving • Job Requirements What you bring • Proficiency in at least one programming language such as Java, Javascript or Python • Experience in Large Language Model (LLM), Machine Learning (ML), Generative AI (GenAI) • Experience in mobile browser and mobile app (Android, IOS) testing and testing automation an asset • Hands on exposure to Test Automation Frameworks / Test Harness an asset Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills • Background checks This role requires successful clearance of a background check (including criminal checks and leadership references). Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: https://hdks.fa.ca2.oraclecloud.com/hcmUI/CandidateExperience/en/sites/Careers-Definity/job/8796 Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
